level.heading: Actions and proceedings for recovery of penalties.
level.text: ยง 7-105 Actions and proceedings for recovery of penalties. The assistant corporation counsel in charge of the recovery of penalties, subject only to the approval of the corporation counsel, may settle, compromise, adjust or discontinue any action brought to recover a penalty in the name of the city or any agency thereof, provided that the penalty sued for does not exceed the sum of two hundred fifty dollars.
